ocean.question: I am big and blue, and fish swim in me. What am I?
I have a shell and crawl on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 Some of my friends live in the water too!

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🖐️ I have lots of arms to help me.

ocean.question: I live in a shell, and sometimes you can hear the ocean when you hold me to your ear. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 I am found on the beach.
🔈 You can hear me if you hold me close.
🏡 Crabs sometimes use me for a home.

ocean.question: I am a big fish with sharp teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am a kind of fish.

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish that lives in coral reefs. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I live with many other fish.
🪴 My home is made of coral.

ocean.question: I am a very large animal that swims in the ocean and sings songs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am bigger than a car.
🎶 I make sounds under the water.
💧I need to come up to breathe air.

ocean.question: I float on the ocean and help people travel across the water. What am I?

hints.text: 🧑‍✈️ People ride on me to get to faraway places.

ocean.question: I am a special place under the sea with lots of colorful plants and animals. What am I?
I am a star-shaped creature that lives on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🏜️ I live at the bottom of the sea.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Cows like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am short and cover the ground.
🐄 Animals eat me to get big and strong.

plant.question: I grow on a tree and you can eat me. I can be red, green, or yellow. What am I?
I have a long stem and a pretty head. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 I am often given as a gift.

plant.question: I grow underground and I am orange. Bunnies like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🚜 You have to pull me out of the ground.

plant.question: I am tall and strong, with many leaves. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 People make houses out of me.
🍁 My leaves change color in the fall.

plant.question: I am long and green and grow on a vine. I am a yummy vegetable that can be made into pickles. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I have bumps on my skin.
🌱 I grow from a yellow flower.
🥗 You can eat me in a salad or as a pickle.

plant.question: I am a big fruit with a green rind and red inside. I have black seeds. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I am very juicy and good in the summer.
🏖️ You see me a lot at picnics.

plant.question: I have sharp needles instead of leaves. People decorate me for Christmas. What am I?
I am a vegetable that looks like a small tree. You can eat me raw or cooked. What am I?

hints.text: 🥦 My florets look like tiny trees.

plant.question: I am a big, round vegetable with layers. I can make you cry when you cut me. What am I?

hints.text: 😢 I can make your eyes water.
